name: cwa-book-downloader
description: Automated Book Downloader extends Calibre-Web by adding automatic ebook discovery and downloads via search providers. It integrates with libraries to streamline collection growth with minimal manual intervention.
features: Automatic Discovery: Find and download ebooks automatically. Grow your library effortlessly.
Calibre Integration: Seamless connection with Calibre-Web. Enhanced library management.
Search Providers: Multiple sources for finding books. Comprehensive coverage.
Minimal Intervention: Set it up and let it work. Hands-off collection building.
Metadata Handling: Proper book information and organization. Clean library structure.
Self-Hosted: Manage your ebook automation privately. Your library, your control.
